mapper.select: SELECT image_id, user_id, class_id, image_text, image_path, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified from image where is_deleted = '1' and image_text = #{imageText}
SELECT image_id, user_id, class_id, image_text, image_path, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified from image where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = '1'
SELECT image_id, user_id, class_id, image_text, image_path, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified from image where user_id = #{userId} and class_id = #{classId} and is_deleted = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image ( image_text, image_path, is_deleted, user_id, class_id, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified) VALUES ( #{imageText}, #{imagePath}, #{deleted}, #{userId}, #{classId}, #{imageGmtCreate}, #{imageGmtModified})
mapper.update: UPDATE image set class_id = #{classId}, image_text = #{imageText}, image_path = #{imagePath}, image_gmt_modified = #{imageGmtModified} where image_id = #{imageId}
